GK19ruphamdu:1: tamālaśyāmāṅgo davahasitalīlāñcitamukhaḥ parānandābhogaḥ sphuratu hṛdi me ko.api puruṣaḥ ||1
GK19ruphamdu:2: yadā yāto gopīhṛdayamadano nandasadanān mukundo gāndinyāstanayamanuvindan madhupurīm |
GK19ruphamdu:3: tadāmānkṣīccintāsariti ghanaghūrṇāparicayair agādhāyāṃ bādhāmayapayasi rādhā virahiṇī ||2
GK19ruphamdu:4: kadācit khedāgniṃ vighaṭayitumantargatamasau sahālībhirlebhe taralitamanā yāmunataṭīm |
GK19ruphamdu:5: cirādasyāścittaṃ paricitakuṭīrakalanād avasthā tastāra sphuṭamatha suṣupteḥ priyasakhī ||3
GK19ruphamdu:8: tatastāṃ nyastāṅgīmurasi lalitāyāḥ kamalinī palāśaiḥ kālindīsalilaśiśirairvījitatanum |
GK19ruphamdu:10: nidhāyāṅke paṅkeruhadalaviṭaṅkasya lalitā tato rādhāṃ nīrāharaṇasaraṇau nyastacaraṇā |
GK19ruphamdu:11: milantaṃ kālindīpulinabhuvi khelāñcitagatiṃ dadarśāgre kaṃcin madhuravirutaṃ śvetagarutam
GK19ruphamdu:12: tadālokastokocchvasitahṛdayā sādaramasau praṇāmaṃ śaṃsantī laghu laghu samāsādya savidham
GK19ruphamdu:13: dhṛtotkaṇṭhā sadyo harisadasi sandeśaharaṇe varaṃ dūtaṃ mene tamatilalitaṃ hanta lalitā ||7
GK19ruphamdu:14: amarṣāt premerṣyāṃ sapadi dadhatī kaṃsamathane pravṛttā haṃsāya svamabhilaṣitaṃ śaṃsitumasau
GK19ruphamdu:15: na tasyā doṣo.ayaṃ yadiha vihagaṃ prārthitavatī
GK19ruphamdu:17: pavitreṣu prāyo viracayasi toyeṣu vasatiṃ pramodaṃ nālīke vahasi viśadātmā svayamasi |
GK19ruphamdu:18: tato.ahaṃ duḥkhārtā śaraṇamabalā tvāṃ gatavatī na yācñā satpakṣe vrajati hi kadācidviphalatām
GK19ruphamdu:19: ciraṃ vismṛtyāsmān virahadahanajvālavikalāḥ kalāvān sānandaṃ vasati mukharāyāṃ madhuripuḥ
GK19ruphamdu:20: tadetaṃ sandeśaṃ svamanasi svamādhāya nikhilaṃ bhavān kṣipraṃ tasya śaraṇapadavīṃ saṅgamayatu
GK19ruphamdu:21: nirastapratyūhaṃ bhavatu bhavato vartmani śivaṃ samuttiṣṭha kṣipraṃ manasi mudamādhāya sadaraṃ
GK19ruphamdu:22: adhastāddhāvanto laghu laghu samuttānanayanair bhavantaṃ vīkṣantāṃ kutukataralā gopaśiśavaḥ
GK19ruphamdu:23: sa vaidagdhīsindhuḥ kaṭhinamatinā dānapatinā yayā ninye tūrṇaṃ paśupayuvatījīvanapatiḥ |
GK19ruphamdu:24: tayā gantavyā te nikhilajagadekaprathitayā padavyā bhavyānāṃ tilaka kila dāśārhanagarī ||12
GK19ruphamdu:26: tvayā vijñātavyā haricaraṇasaṅgapraṇayino dhruvaṃ sā cakrāṅkīratisakha śatāṅgasya padavī ||13
GK19ruphamdu:27: piban jambūśyāmaṃ mihiraduhiturvāri madhuraṃ mṛṇālīrbhuñjāno himakarakaṇākomalarucaḥ |
GK19ruphamdu:28: kṣaṇaṃ hṛṣṭastiṣṭhan niviḍaviṭape śākhini sakhe sukhena prasthānaṃ racayatu bhavān vṛṣṇinagare
GK19ruphamdu:30: tamādau panthānaṃ racaya caritārthā bhavatu te virājantī sarvopari paramahaṃsasthitiriyam
GK19ruphamdu:31: akasmādasmākaṃ harirapaharann aṃśukacayaṃ yamārūḍho gūḍhapraṇayalaharīṃ kandalayitum |
GK19ruphamdu:32: tavāśrāntasyāntaḥsthagitaravibimbaḥ kisalayaiḥ kadambaḥ kādamba tvaritamavalambaḥ sa bhavitā
GK19ruphamdu:33: kirantī lāvaṇyaṃ diśi diśi śikhaṇḍastavakinī dadhānā sādhīyaḥ kanakavimalajyotivasanam |
GK19ruphamdu:34: tamālaśyāmāṅgī saralamuralīcumbitamukhī jagau citraṃ yatra prakaṭaparamānandalaharī ||17
GK19ruphamdu:38: catuḥśālaṃ śaureḥ sphurati na dṛśau tatra vikireḥ |
GK19ruphamdu:40: kriye jāte tāvat tvayi bata hatā gopavanitā ||19
GK19ruphamdu:41: mama syādarthānāṃ kṣatiriha vilambādyadapi te vilokethāḥ sarvaṃ tadapi harikelisthalamidam
GK19ruphamdu:42: taveyaṃ vyarthā bhavatu śucitā kaḥ sa hi sakhe guṇo yaścāṇūradviṣi matiniveśāya na bhavet
GK19ruphamdu:44: sa dhenūnāṃ bandhurmadhumathanakhaṭṭāyitaśilaḥ kariṣyaty ānandaṃ sapadi tava govardhanagiriḥ
GK19ruphamdu:45: tamevādriṃ cakrāṅkitakarapariṣvaṅgirasikaṃ mahīcakre śaṅkemahi śikhariṇāṃ śekharatayā |
GK19ruphamdu:46: arātiṃ jñātīnāṃ nanu hariharaṃ yaḥ paribhavan yathārthaṃ svaṃ nāma vyadhita govardhana iti
GK19ruphamdu:47: tamālasyālokād giri-parisare santi capalāḥ pulindyo govinda-smaraṇa-rabhasottapta-vapuṣaḥ
GK19ruphamdu:48: śanais tāsāṃ tāpaṃ kṣaṇam apanayan yāsyati bhavān avaśyaṃ kālindī-salila-śiśiraiḥ pakṣa-pavanaiḥ
GK19ruphamdu:49: tadante śrīkāntasmaraṇasamaraghāṭīpulakitā kadambānāṃ vāṭī rasikaparipāṭī sphurayati |
GK19ruphamdu:50: tvamāsīnastasyāṃ na yadi parito nandasi tato babhūva vyarthā te ghanarasanivāsavyasanitā ||24
GK19ruphamdu:51: śaranmeghaśreṇīpratibhaṭamariṣṭāsuraśiraś ciraṃ śuṣkaṃ vṛndāvanaparisare drakṣyati bhavān
GK19ruphamdu:54: ruvan yāhi svairaṃ caramadaśayā cumbitaruco nitambinyo vṛndāvanabhuvi sakhe santi bahavaḥ
GK19ruphamdu:55: parāvartiṣyante tulitamurajinnūpuraravāt tavādhvānāt tāsāṃ bahirapi gatāḥ kṣipramasavaḥ ||26
GK19ruphamdu:56: tvamāsīnaḥ śākhāntaramilitacaṇḍatviṣi sukhaṃ dadhīthā bhāṇḍīre kṣaṇamapi ghanaśyāmalarucau
GK19ruphamdu:57: tato haṃsaṃ bibhrannikhilanabhasaścitramiṣayā sa vardhiṣṇuṃ viṣṇuṃ kalitadaracakraṃ tulayitā
GK19ruphamdu:59: jihīthāḥ vikhyātāṃ sphutamiha bhavadbāndhavarathaṃ praviṣṭaṃ maṃsyante vidhimaṭavidevyastvayi gate ||28
GK19ruphamdu:65: purastasmin nīpadrumakusumakiñjalkasurabhau tvayā puṇye peyaṃ madhuramudakaṃ kāliyahrade ||30
GK19ruphamdu:68: iti krāntvā kekākṛtavirutamekādaśavanaṃ ghanībhūtaṃ cutairvraja madhuvanaṃ dvādaśamidam |
GK19ruphamdu:72: niviṣṭā kālindītaṭabhuvi tavādhāsāti sakhe samastādānandaṃ madhurajalavṛndā madhupurī ||33
GK19ruphamdu:73: vṛṣaḥ śambhoryasyāṃ daśati navamekatra yavasaṃ viriñceranyasmin gilati kalahaṃso visalatām
GK19ruphamdu:74: kvacit kroñcārāteḥ kavalayati kekī viṣadharaṃ vilīḍhe śallakyā valaripukarī pallavamitaḥ ||34
GK19ruphamdu:75: arodhiṣṭhāḥ kāyān na hi vicalitāṃ pracchadapaṭīṃ vimuktāmajñāsīḥ pathi pathi na muktāvalimapi
GK19ruphamdu:76: ayi śrīgovindasmaraṇamadirāmattahṛdaye satīti khyātiste hasati kulaṭānāṃ kulamidam ||35
GK19ruphamdu:77: asavyaṃ bibhrāṇā padamadhūtalākṣārasamasau prayātāhaṃ mugdhe virama mama veśaiḥ kimadhunā
GK19ruphamdu:78: amandādāśaṅke sakhi purapurandhrikalakalād alindāgre vṛndāvanakusumadhanvā vijayate ||36
GK19ruphamdu:80: kimasmān etasmin maṇibhavanapṛṣṭhādvinudatī tvamekā stabdhākṣī sthagayasi gavākṣāvalimapi
GK19ruphamdu:81: muhuḥ śūnyāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ vahasi dhyāyasi sadā śṛṇoṣi pratyakṣaṃ navaparijanavijñāpanaśataṃ |
GK19ruphamdu:82: tataḥ śaṅke paṅkeruhamukhi yayau śyāmalaruciḥ sa yūno mūrtaṃ sambhava nayanavīthīpathikatām
GK19ruphamdu:83: vilajjaṃ mā rodīriha sakhi punaryāsyati hari-
GK19ruphamdu:85: iti svairaṃ yasyāṃ pathi pathi murārerabhinava-
GK19ruphamdu:91: atha bhrāmaṃ bhrāmaṃ kramaghaṭanayā saṅkaṭatarān nivāsān vṛṣṇīnāmanusara purīmadhavasitam
GK19ruphamdu:94: suhṛdbuddhyā haṃsāḥ kalitamadhurasyāmbujabhuvaḥ samaryādaṃ yeṣāṃ sapadi paricaryāṃ vidadhīta
GK19ruphamdu:95: cirān mṛgyantīnāṃ paśuparamaṇīnāmapi kulair alabdhaṃ kālindīpulinavipine {līnamaṇḍitaḥ} |
GK19ruphamdu:96: sadā lokollāsismitaparicitāsyaṃ sahacari sphurantaṃ vīkṣiṣye punarapi kimagre murabhidam ||43
GK19ruphamdu:97: viṣādaṃ mā kārṣīdrutimavitatthavyāhṛtirasau samāgantā rādhe dhṛtanavaśikhaṇḍastava sakhā |
GK19ruphamdu:99: ghanaśyāmā bhrāmyaty upari hariharmasya śikhibhiḥ kṛtastotrā mugdhairagururacitā dhūmalatikā
GK19ruphamdu:100: tadālokāddhīra sphurati tava cen mānasarucir jitaṃ tarhi svairaṃ jalasahanivāsapriyatayā ||45
GK19ruphamdu:104: alinde yasyāste marakatamayī yaṣṭiramalā śayāluryāṃ rātrau madakalakalāpī kalayati |
GK19ruphamdu:105: nirāṭaṅkastsyāḥ śikharamadhiruhya śramanudaṃ pratīkṣethā bhrātarvaramavasaraṃ yādavapateḥ
GK19ruphamdu:106: niviṣṭaḥ palāṅke mṛdulataratulīdhavalite trilokalakṣmīṇāṃ kakudi darasātīkṛtatanūḥ |
GK19ruphamdu:107: amandaṃ pūrṇendupratimamupadhānaṃ pramudito nidhāyāgre tasminn upahitakaphonidvayabharam ||48
GK19ruphamdu:109: vasānaḥ kauśeyaṃ jitakanakalakṣmī parimalaṃ mukundaste sākṣāt pramadasudhayā sekṣyati dṛśoḥ
GK19ruphamdu:110: vikadruḥ paurāṇīrakhilakulavṛddho yadupater adūrādāsīno madhurabhanitīrgāsyati sadā |
GK19ruphamdu:111: purastādābhīrīgaṇabhayadanāmā sa kaṭhino maṇistambhālambī kurukulakathāṃ saṅkalayitā ||50
GK19ruphamdu:113: sa jānubhyāmaṣṭāpadabhuvanamavaṣṭabhya bhavitā guroḥ śiṣyo nūnaṃ padakamalasaṃvāhanarataḥ
GK19ruphamdu:114: vihaṅgendro yugmīkṛtakarasarojo bhuvi puraḥ kṛtāsaṅgo bhāvī prajavini nirdeśe.arpitamanāḥ
GK19ruphamdu:115: chadadvandve yasya dhvanati mathurāvāsibaṭavo vyadasyante sāmasvarajanitamanyonyakalaham ||52
GK19ruphamdu:121: kṣaṇaṃ yān ālokya prakaṭaparamānandavivaśaḥ sa devarṣirmuktān api tanubhṛtaḥ śocati bhṛśam
GK19ruphamdu:124: himaṃ vande nīcairanucitavidhānavyasanināṃ yadeṣāṃ prāṇāntaṃ damanamanuvarṣaṃ praṇayati ||55
GK19ruphamdu:131: dyutiṃ dhatte yasya trivalilatikāsaṅkaṭataraṃ sakhe dāmaśreṇīkṣapaṇaracanābhijñamudaram |
GK19ruphamdu:132: yaśodā yasyāntaḥ suranarabhujaṅgaiḥ parivṛtaṃ mukhadvārā vāradvayamavaluloke tribhuvanam ||58
GK19ruphamdu:133: urau yasya sphāraṃ sphurati vanamālāvalayitaṃ vitanvānaṃ tanvījanamanasi sadyo manasijam |
GK19ruphamdu:134: marīcībhiryasmin ravinivahatulyo.api vahate sadā khadyotābhāṃ bhuvanamadhuraḥ kaustubhamaṇiḥ
GK19ruphamdu:141: kimebhirvyāhāraiḥ kalaya kathayāmi sphuṭamahaṃ sakhe niḥsandehaṃ paricayapadaṃ kevalamidam
GK19ruphamdu:142: parānando yasmin nayanapadavībhrāji bhavitā tvayā vijñātavyā madhurarava so.ayaṃ madhuripuḥ
GK19ruphamdu:145: tadā nāsmān grāmyāḥ pravaṇapadavīṃ tasya gamayeḥ sudhāpūrṇaṃ cetaḥ kathamapi na takraṃ mṛgayate
GK19ruphamdu:146: yadā vṛndāraṇyasmaraṇalaharīheturamaṇaṃ pikānāṃ veveṣṭi pratiharitamuccaiḥ kuhurutam |
GK19ruphamdu:149: purātiṣṭhan goṣṭhān nikhilaramaṇībhyaḥ priyatayā bhavān yasyāṃ gopīramaṇa vidadhe gauravabharam
GK19ruphamdu:150: sakhī tasyā vijñāpayati lalitā dhīralalita praṇamya śrīpādāmbujakanakapīṭhīparisare ||65
GK19ruphamdu:153: cirādūdhobhāraṃ sphuraṇaparamākrāntajaghanā babhūva praṣṭhauhī muramathana seyaṃ kapalikā
GK19ruphamdu:154: samīpe nīpānāṃ tricaturadalā hanta gamitā tvayā yā mākandapriyasahacarībhāvaniyatim |
GK19ruphamdu:157: prasūto devakyā madhumathana yaḥ ko.api puruṣaḥ sa yāto gopālābhyudayaparamānandavasatim |
GK19ruphamdu:158: dhṛto yo gāndhinyā kaṭhinajaṭhare samprati tataḥ samantādevāstaṃ śiva śiva gatā gokulakathā
GK19ruphamdu:159: ariṣṭenoddhatāḥ paśupasudṛśo yāti vipadaṃ tṛṇāvartākrānto racayati bhayaṃ catvaracayaḥ |
GK19ruphamdu:160: amī vyomībhūtā vrajavasatibhūmī parisarā vahante santāpaṃ murahara vidūraṃ tvayi gate ||69
GK19ruphamdu:161: tvayā nāgantavyaṃ kathamapi hare goṣṭhamadhunā latā śreṇī vṛndāvanabhuvi yato.abhūdviṣamayī
GK19ruphamdu:162: prasūnānāṃ gandhaṃ madhumathana tadā vātanihitaṃ bhajan sadyo mūrcchāṃ vahati nivaho gopasudṛśām
GK19ruphamdu:163: kathaṃ saṅgo.asmābhiḥ saha samucitaḥ samprati hare-
GK19ruphamdu:165: gataḥ kālo yasmin paśuparamaṇīsaṅgamakṛte bhavān vyagrastasthau tamasi gṛhavāṭiviṭapini ||71
GK19ruphamdu:166: vayaṃ tyaktāḥ svāmin yadi tava kiṃ dūṣaṇamidaṃ nisargaḥ śyāmānāmayamatitarāṃ duṣpariharaḥ
GK19ruphamdu:167: kuhūkaṇṭhairaṇḍāvadhi saha nivāsāt paricitā visṛjyante sadyaḥ kalitanavapakṣairvalibhujaḥ
GK19ruphamdu:168: ayaṃ pūrvo raṅgaḥ kila paricito yasya tarasā rasādākhyātavyaṃ parikalaya tan nāṭakamidam |
GK19ruphamdu:169: mayā praṣṭavyo.asi prathamamiti vṛndāvanapate kimāhā rādheti smarasi hatakaṃ varṇayugalam
GK19ruphamdu:170: aye kuñjadroṇīkuharagṛhamedhin kimadhunā parokṣaṃ vakṣyante paśuparamaṇīdurniyatayaḥ |
GK19ruphamdu:171: pravīṇā gopīnāṃ tava caraṇapadme.api yadiyaṃ yayau rādhā sādhāraṇasamucitapraśnapadavīm ||74
GK19ruphamdu:172: tvayā goṣṭhaṃ goṣṭhītilaka kila cedvismṛtamidaṃ na tūrṇaṃ dhūmorṇāpatirapi vidhatte yadi kṛpām
GK19ruphamdu:173: aharvṛndaṃ vṛndāvanakusumapālīparimalair darālokaṃ śokāspadamiva kathaṃ neṣyati sakhī ||75
GK19ruphamdu:174: taraṅgaiḥ kurvāṇā śamanabhaginīlāghavamasau nadīṃ kāṃcidgoṣṭhe nayanajalapūrairajanayat |
GK19ruphamdu:175: itīvāsyā dveṣādabhimatadaśāprārthanamayīṃ murāre vijñaptiṃ niśamayati mānī na śamanaḥ ||76
GK19ruphamdu:176: kṛtākṛṣṭikrīḍaṃ kimapi tava rūpaṃ mama sakhī sakṛddṛṣṭvā dūrādahitahitabodhojjhitamatiḥ |
GK19ruphamdu:177: hatā seyaṃ premānalamanu viśantī sarabhasaṃ pataṅgīvātmānaṃ murahara muhurdāhitavatī ||77
GK19ruphamdu:178: mayā vācyaḥ kiṃ vā tvamiha nijadoṣāt paramasau yayau mandā vṛndāvanakusumabandho vidhuratām
GK19ruphamdu:179: yadarthaṃ duḥkhāgnirvikṛśati tamadyāpi hṛdayān na yasmāddurmedhā lavamapi bhavantaṃ davayati
GK19ruphamdu:180: trivakrāho dhanyā hṛdayamiva te svaṃ puramasau samāsādya svairaṃ yadiha vilasantī nivasati
GK19ruphamdu:181: dhruvaṃ puṇyabhraṃśādajani saraleyaṃ mama sakhī praveśastatrābhūt kṣaṇamapi yadasyā na sulabhaḥ
GK19ruphamdu:182: kimāviṣṭā bhūtaiḥ sapadi yadi vākrūraphaṇinā kṣatāpasmāreṇa cyutamatirakasmāt kimapatat |
GK19ruphamdu:188: ścirādārtā vārtāmapi tava yadeṣā na labhate ||81
GK19ruphamdu:189: janān siddhādaśān namati bhajate māntrikagaṇān vidhatte śuśrūṣāmadhikavinayenauṣadhavidām
GK19ruphamdu:190: tvadīkṣādīkṣāyai paricarati bhaktyā girisutāṃ manīṣā hi vyagrā kimapi śubhahetuṃ na manute
GK19ruphamdu:192: sadābhyarṇe nandīśvaragiribhuvo raṅgarasikaṃ bhavantaṃ kaṃsāre bhajati bhavadāptyai mama sakhī
GK19ruphamdu:195: nidhāsayantī kaṇṭhe tava nijabhujāvallarīmasau dharanyāmunmīlajjāḍimaniviḍāṅgī viluṭhati ||84
GK19ruphamdu:198: tathāsyā rādhāyā virahadahanākalpitadhiyo murāre duḥsādhyā kṣaṇamapi na bādhā viramati ||85
GK19ruphamdu:201: yadeṣā kaṃsāre bhidurahṛdayaṃ tvāmavayati satīnāṃ mūrdhanyā bhidurahṛdayābhūdanudinam ||86
GK19ruphamdu:202: samakṣaṃ sarveṣāṃ viharasi madādhipraṇayinām iti śrutvā nūnaṃ gurutarasamādhiṃ kalayati |
GK19ruphamdu:203: sadā kaṃsārāte bhajasi yamināṃ netrapadavīm iti vyaktaṃ sajjībhavati yamamālocitumapi ||87
GK19ruphamdu:205: vrajānandin nandīśvaradayita nandātmaja hare sadeti krandantī parijanaśucaṃ kandalayati ||88
GK19ruphamdu:207: tanūbhūtaṃ sadyastanuvanamidaṃ hāsyati hare haṭhādadya śvo vā mama sahacarīprāṇahariṇaḥ ||89
GK19ruphamdu:208: payorāśisphītatviṣi himakarottaṃsamadhure dadhāne dṛgbhaṅgyā smaravijayirūpaṃ mama sakhī |
GK19ruphamdu:209: hare dattasvāntā bhavati tadimāṃ kiṃ prabhavati smaro hantuṃ kintu vyathayati bhavān eva kutukī
GK19ruphamdu:210: vijānīme bhāvaṃ paśuparamaṇīnāṃ yadumaṇe na jānīmaḥ kasmāt tadapi tava māyā racayati |
GK19ruphamdu:213: gurorantevāsī sa bhajati yadūnāṃ sacivatāṃ sakhīyaṃ kālindī kila bhavati kālasya bhaginī |
GK19ruphamdu:214: bhavedanyaḥ ko vā narapatipure matparicito daśāmasyāḥ śaṃsan yadutilaka yastvāmanunayet ||92
GK19ruphamdu:216: paridhvastāmodāṃ viramitasamastālikutukāṃ vidho pādasparśādapi sukhaya rādhākumudinīm ||93
GK19ruphamdu:219: atikrānte sampraty avadhidivase jīvanavidhau hatāśā niḥśaṅkaṃ vitarati dṛśau cutamukule ||94
GK19ruphamdu:222: amuñcantī saṅgaṃ kuvalayadṛśaḥ kevalamasau kalādadya prāṇān avati bhavāśāsahacarī ||95
GK19ruphamdu:223: aye rāsakrīḍārasika mama sakhyāṃ navanavā purā baddhā yena praṇayalaharī hanta gahanā |
GK19ruphamdu:224: sa cen muktāpekṣastvamapi dhig imāṃ tulaśakalaṃ yadetasyā nāsānihitamidamadyāpi calati ||96
GK19ruphamdu:225: mukunda bhrāntākṣī kimapi yadasaṃkalpitaśataṃ vidhatte tadvaktuṃ jagati manujaḥ kaḥ prabhavati
GK19ruphamdu:228: abhūt ko.api premā mayi murariporyaḥ sakhi purā parāṃ karmāpekṣāmapi tadavalambān na gaṇayet
GK19ruphamdu:229: tathedānīṃ hā dhik samajani taṭasthaḥ sphuṭamahaṃ bhaje lajjāṃ yena kṣaṇamapi punarjīvitumapi
GK19ruphamdu:230: garīyān me premā tvayi paramiti snehalaghutā na jīviṣyāmīti praṇayagarimakhyāpanavidhiḥ |
GK19ruphamdu:231: kathaṃ nāyāsīti smaraṇaparipāṭīprakaṭanaṃ harau sandeśāya priyasakhi na me vāgavasaraḥ ||99
GK19ruphamdu:232: amī kuñjaḥ pūrvaṃ na mama dadhire kāmapi mudaṃ drumālīyaṃ cetaḥ sakhi na katiśo nanditavatī
GK19ruphamdu:233: idānīṃ paśyaite yugapadapatāpaṃ vidadhate prabho muktopekṣe bhajati na hi ko vā vimukhatām
GK19ruphamdu:236: yayau kālaḥ kalyāṇy adhikalitakelī parimalāṃ vilāsārthī yasminn acalakuhare līnavapuṣam |
GK19ruphamdu:237: sa māṃ dhṛtvā dhūrtaḥ kṛtakapaṭaroṣāṃ sakhi haṭhā-
GK19ruphamdu:241: mano me hā kaṣṭaṃ jvalati kimahaṃ hanta karavai na pāraṃ nāvāraṃ kimapi kalayāmy asya jaladheḥ
GK19ruphamdu:242: iyaṃ vande mūrdhnā sapadi tamupāyaṃ kathaya māṃ
GK19ruphamdu:244: prayāto māṃ hitvā yadi kaṭhinacūḍāmaṇirasau paryātu svacchandaṃ mama samayadharmaḥ kila gatiḥ
GK19ruphamdu:245: idaṃ soḍhuṃ kā vā prabhavati yataḥ svapnakapaṭā-
GK19ruphamdu:247: anaucityaṃ tasya vyathayati mano hanta mathurāṃ tvamāsādya svairaṃ capalahṛdayaṃ vāraya harim
GK19ruphamdu:248: sakhi svapnārambhe punarapi yathā vibhrama madā-
GK19ruphamdu:249: dihāyāto dhūrtaḥ kṣapayati na me kiṅkiniguṇam ||106
GK19ruphamdu:250: ayi svapno dūre viramatu samakṣaṃ śṛṇu haṭhā-
GK19ruphamdu:255: vidhīrṣan māṃ harṣottaralanayanāntaḥ sa kutukī na vaṃśīmajñāsīdbhuvi karasarojādvigalitām
GK19ruphamdu:257: parīhāsārambhī priyasakhi sa māṃ lambitamukhīṃ prapede cumbāya sphuradadharabimbastava sakhā
GK19ruphamdu:260: kacākṛṣṭikrīḍākramaparicite cauryacarite harirlabdhopādhiḥ prasabhamanayan māṃ giridarīm ||110
GK19ruphamdu:261: kadācidvāsantīkuharabhuvi dhṛṣṭaḥ sarabhasaṃ hasan pṛṣṭhālambī sthagayati karābhyāṃ mama dṛśau
GK19ruphamdu:262: didhīrṣau jāterṣyaṃ mayi sakhi tadīyāṅguliśikhāṃ na jāne kutrāyaṃ vrajati kitavānāṃ kila guruḥ
GK19ruphamdu:263: atīteyaṃ vārtā viramatu puraḥ paśya sarale vayasyaste so.ayaṃ smitamadhurimonmṛṣṭavadanaḥ
GK19ruphamdu:265: taduttiṣṭha vrīḍāvati niviḍamuktālatikayā vadhānemaṃ dhūrtaṃ sakhi madhupurīṃ yāti na yathā
GK19ruphamdu:266: iti premonmīladbhavadanubhavārūḍhajaḍimā sakhīnāmākrandaṃ na kila katiśaḥ kandalayati ||113
GK19ruphamdu:269: tadārambhādgopīgaṇaratiguro nirbharamasau na lebhe lubdhāpi tvadamalabhujastambharabhasam
GK19ruphamdu:272: tvadutsaṅge nidrāsukhamukulitākṣīṃ punarimāṃ kadāhaṃ seviṣye kiśalayakalāpavyajaninī ||115
GK19ruphamdu:275: tava skandhopānte vinihitabhujāvallarimahaṃ kadā kuñje līnā rahasi vihasiṣyāmi sumukhīm ||116
GK19ruphamdu:276: vidūrādāhartuṃ kusumamupayāmi tvamadhunā purastīre tīre kalaya tulasīpallavamidam |
GK19ruphamdu:277: iti vyājādenāṃ viditabhavadīyasthitirahaṃ kadā kuñje gopīramaṇa gamayiṣyāmi samaye ||117
GK19ruphamdu:278: iti śrīkaṃsāreḥ padakamalayorgokulakathāṃ nivedya pratyekaṃ bhaja parijaneṣu praṇayitām |
GK19ruphamdu:279: nijāṅke kādambīsahacara vahan maṇḍanatayā na yān uccaiḥ premapravaṇamanujagrāha bhagavān ||118
GK19ruphamdu:280: miladbhaṅgīṃ haṃsīramaṇa vanamālāṃ prathamato mudā kṣemaṃ pṛcchann idamupaharethā mama vacaḥ
GK19ruphamdu:281: ciraṃ kaṃsārāterurasi sahavāsapraṇayinīṃ kimenāmenākṣīṃ guṇavati visasmāra bhavatī ||119
GK19ruphamdu:282: idaṃ kiṃ vā hanta smarasi rasike khaṇḍanaruṣā parītāṅgī govardhanagirinitambe mama sakhī |
GK19ruphamdu:283: bhiyā sambhrāntākṣaṃ yadiha vicakarṣa tvayi balā-
GK19ruphamdu:285: tataḥ sambhāṣethāḥ śrutimakaramudrāmiti mudā bhavatyāṃ kartavyaḥ kimiti kuśalapraśnajaḍimā
GK19ruphamdu:286: rucismerā yā tvaṃ racayasi sadā cumbanakalām apāṅgena spṛṣṭā sakhi murariporgaṇḍamukure ||121
GK19ruphamdu:287: nivāsaste devi śravaṇalatikāyāmiti dhiyā prayatnāt tvāmeva praṇayahṛdayā yāmi śaraṇam |
GK19ruphamdu:288: parokṣaṃ vṛṣṇīnāṃ nibhṛtanibhṛtaṃ karṇakuhare hareḥ kākūnmiśrāṃ kathaya sakhi rādhāvidhuratām
GK19ruphamdu:289: parīrambhaṃ premṇā mama savinayaṃ kaustubhamaṇau bruvāṇaḥ kurvīthāḥ patagavara vijñāpanamidam
GK19ruphamdu:290: agādhā rādhāyāmapi tava sakhe vismṛtirabhūt kathaṃ vā kalyāṇaṃ vahati tarale hi praṇayitā
GK19ruphamdu:295: navīnastvaṃ kambo paśuparamaṇībhiḥ paricayaṃ na dhatse rādhāyāḥ guṇagarimagandho.api na kṛtī
GK19ruphamdu:296: tathāpi tvāṃ yāce hṛdayanihitaṃ dohadamahaṃ vahante hi klānte praṇayamavadātaprakṛtayaḥ ||125
GK19ruphamdu:297: gṛhītvā govindaṃ jaladhihṛdayānandana sakhe sukhena śrīvṛndāvanaparisare nandatu bhavān |
GK19ruphamdu:298: kathaṃ vā te goṣṭhaṃ bhavatu dayitaṃ hanta balavān yadetasmin veṇorjayati cirasaubhāgyamahimā
GK19ruphamdu:299: iti premodgārapravaṇamanunīya kramavaśāṃ parīvārān bhrātarniśamayati cāṇūramathane |
GK19ruphamdu:300: punaḥ kopodbhinnapraṇayacaṭulaṃ tasya nikaṭe kathāmācakṣīthāḥ daśabhiravatārairvilasitām ||127
GK19ruphamdu:301: grahītuṃ tvāṃ premāmiṣaparivṛtaṃ cittavaḍiśaṃ mahāmīna kṣipraṃ nādhita rasapūre mama sakhī
GK19ruphamdu:302: vivekākhyaṃ chittvā guṇamatha tadagrāsi bhavatā hatāśeyaṃ kiṃ vā śiva śiva vidhātuṃ prabhavati
GK19ruphamdu:303: varākīyaṃ dṛṣṭvā subhagavapuṣo vibhramabharaṃ tavābhyarṇaṃ bheje paramakutukollāsitamatiḥ
GK19ruphamdu:304: tirodhāya svāṅgaṃ prakaṭayasi yat tvaṃ kaṭhinatāṃ tadetat kiṃ na syāt tava kamaṭhamūrteḥ samucitam
GK19ruphamdu:305: sadā kaṃsārate sphurati ciramadyāpi bhavataḥ sphuṭaṃ kroḍākāre vapuṣi niviḍapremalaharī |
GK19ruphamdu:306: yataḥ sā sairandhrī malayaruhapaṅkapraṇayinī tvayā kroḍīcakre paramarabhasādātmadayitā ||130
GK19ruphamdu:308: stadīyo vyāpārastava tu na yayau vismṛtipatham |
GK19ruphamdu:309: vinītaprahlādastvamiha paramakrūracarite prasakto yadbhūyaḥ parahṛdayabhedaṃ janayasi ||131
GK19ruphamdu:310: yadātmānaṃ darpādagaṇitagururvāmana mudā manorājyenāḍhyaṃ tvayi valitayā kalpitavatī |
GK19ruphamdu:311: prapede tasyedaṃ phalamucitameva priyasakhī vidūre yat kṣiptā praṇayamayapāśe nigaḍitā ||132
GK19ruphamdu:312: iyaṃ nātha krūrā bhṛgupatanamakaṅkṣati tato yadasyāṃ kaṭhināṃ tava samucitaṃ tadbhṛgupate
GK19ruphamdu:313: asau te durbodhā kṛtiriha bhavadvismṛtipathaṃ yato jātaḥ sākṣādgururapi sa nandīśvarapatiḥ
GK19ruphamdu:314: nirānandā gāvaściramupasṛtā dūṣaṇakulaiḥ kharāyante sadyo raghutilaka govardhanataṭīḥ |
GK19ruphamdu:319: vitanvānaḥ kāntiṃ vapuṣi śaradākāśavalitāṃ kṛto na tvaṃ sīradhvaja bhajasi vṛndāvanamidam
GK19ruphamdu:320: na rāgaṃ sarvajña kvacidapi vidhatte ratipatiṃ muhurdveṣṭi drohaṃ kalayati balādiṣṭavidhaye
GK19ruphamdu:322: stathāpyasyāṃ haṃho sadayahṛdaya tvaṃ na dayase ||136
GK19ruphamdu:324: tvamāsīnaḥ kalkinniha caturagopāhitaratiḥ sadeśaṃ kurvīthāḥ pratimuditavīrādhikamidam ||137
GK19ruphamdu:325: iti premodghāṭasampuṭitavaco bhaṅgirakhilaṃ tvamāvedya klidyan mukhaparisaro locanajalaiḥ
GK19ruphamdu:328: praṇetavyo dṛṣṭeranubhavapathaṃ nandatanayo vidheyo gopīnāṃ bhuvanamahitānāmupakṛtiḥ |
GK19ruphamdu:332: rvivektuṃ śakyete sapadi milite yena payasī |
GK19ruphamdu:333: kathaṃ kāraṃ yukto bhavatu bhavatastasya kṛtinā vilambaḥ kādambīramaṇa mathurāsaṅgamavidhau
GK19ruphamdu:334: prapannaḥ premāṇaṃ prabhavati sadā bhāgavatabhāk parācīno janmāvadhibhavarasādbhaktimadhuraḥ
GK19ruphamdu:335: ciraṃ ko.api śrīmān jayati viditaḥ śākaratayā dhurīṇo dhīrāṇāmadhidharaṇi vaiyāsakiriva ||141
